product_name: The North Face Torpedo Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Torpedo jacket for women is the perfect solution to conserve core heat when the air outside has a not-so-welcome chill. Polyester fabric on front and back create a barrier against wind and light rain; polyester mesh maximizes breathability. Durable Water Repellent finish helps light precipitation bead up and roll off, and jacket protects skin from too much UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Zip hand pockets offer plenty of space to stash all the things you need for your workout; reach around to the rear lower-back pocket from either side to stash additional items. Hem is slightly dropped in back to enhance coverage, and a cinch cord tightens up jacket around waist to keep out chills. Reflective piping and logos help increase your visibility in dim light. The women's Torpedo jacket from The North Face offers a fit that stays with the body without being restrictive.
short_description: The North Face Torpedo jacket for women is the perfect solution to conserve core heat when the air outside has a not-so-welcome chill.
